summaries.title: Rusesabagina: Uko Qatar iza mu irekurwa rye
summaries.description: Byitezwe ko igihe icyo aricyo cyose Rusesabagina ashobora kuva mu Rwanda, ariko ntabwo ahita ajya mu rugo rwe muri Amerika, arabanza muri Qatar.
summaries.imageAlt: Kuwa kabiri Perezida Kagame yari i Doha aho yaganiriye n'umutegetsi w'ikirenga w'iki gihugu Tamim bin Hamad Al-Thani.

summaries.title: Uganda: Umuhungu wa Museveni avuga ko azasezera mu gisirikare 'uyu mwaka'
summaries.description: Abitangaje hashize iminsi asibye ubutumwa bwo kuri Twitter, yavugagamo ko aziyamamaza mu matora ya perezida yo mu mwaka wa 2026.
summaries.imageAlt: Muhoozi Kainerugaba

summaries.title: Jack Ma washinze Alibaba yabonetse nyuma y'igihe kinini atagaragara
summaries.description: Jack Ma w'imyaka 58 yabonetse gacye kuva yanenga abashinzwe kugenzura ubukungu bw'Ubushinwa mu 2020.
summaries.imageAlt: Kuva mu mpera za 2020 Jack Ma yabonetse gacye cyane mu bantu

summaries.title: Rusesabagina na ‘Sankara’ bararekurwa, 'si ku gitutu cya Amerika' - Umuvugizi
summaries.description: Paul Rusesabagina mu ibaruwa isaba imbabazi yatangajwe na leta, avuga ko “ibibazo bijyanye na politiki y’u Rwanda nzabisiga inyuma yanjye”.
summaries.imageAlt: Rusesabagina yerekanywe afungiye mu Rwanda muri Kanama(8) 2020 mu buryo bwavuzweho cyane

summaries.title: Uyu munsi mu rubanza rwa Kabuga: Inzobere yavuze ko atashobora gusubiza ku byo aregwa
summaries.description: Inzobere mu buzima bwo mu mutwe Profeseri Gillian Mezey, umwe muri eshatu zigenga zakoze raporo ku buzima bwa Kabuga, ni we wumviswe uyu munsi.
summaries.imageAlt: Félicien Kabuga ubwo yari akurikiye iburanisha kuri uyu wa kane

summaries.title: Impinduka muri leta DR Congo - Vital Kamerhe na Jean Pierre Bemba binjiye muri guverinoma
summaries.description: Vital Kamerhe na Jean Pierre Bemba ni bamwe mu bigugu muri politiki ya DR Congo bashobora gukomeza uruhande rwa Tshisekedi mbere y’amatora.
summaries.imageAlt: Vital Kamerhe (ibumoso) na Jean Pierre Bemba

summaries.title: DR Congo – Rwanda: Abahitanywe n'imyuzure bari gushobora gukingirwa?
summaries.description: Abantu amajana bapfiriye nka rimwe, mu burengero bushira uburaruko mu Rwanda, na Kalehe muri DR Congo, ibihumbi baracaronderwa. Umuhinga Ir. Anne-Marie Bihirabake agabisha ibi bihugu ko ata kwijajara.
summaries.imageAlt: Abishwe n'imyuzure baharurwa mu majana, ibihumbi baracaronderwa

summaries.title: Turkey: igihe co gusuzuma intwaro ya Erdogan kirageze
summaries.imageAlt: Erdogan yiyamamaza inyuma y'imyaka 20 ari k'ubutegeetsi

summaries.title: Umwami Charles III: ibimenyetso bikomeye vy’ubwami, mw’iyimikwa
summaries.imageAlt: Umwami Charles III n'umwamikazi Camilla

summaries.title: Charles III: Iyimikwa nk’Umwami rivuze iki kuri bamwe, muri Africa?
summaries.imageAlt: Uko bamwe muri Africa babona iyimikwa rya Charles III

summaries.title: Uko ibihugu biri mu ngorane z’ubutunzi bitabarwa
summaries.imageAlt: Ku cicaro c'ikigega c'isi muri USA

summaries.title: Kenya: ahabereye ivyaha burimwo impfu zifatiye kw’idini
summaries.imageAlt: Abapfuye bisonzesha bashoboye gutorwa barahambwe n'iteka

summaries.title: Isi yibuka ko umubu ari kamwe m’udukoko twica: gute?
summaries.imageAlt: Uko hamwe muri Afrika batuza imibu itera malaria

summaries.title: “Ninasubira kuba muto nshaka kuzomera nk’umuhungu wanje”
summaries.imageAlt: Bryan Johnson w’imyaka 45, avuga ko afise imyaka 18.

summaries.title: Sudan: Tahura imvo y’izi ntambara
summaries.imageAlt: Intambara zasize igisagara Khartoum ari umusaka

summaries.title: Video: Emery Ngarambe aravuga ingaruka zo gufata 'booster' n'uko yayihevye
summaries.description: Kubera kunywa ibiyayuramutwe, Emery Ngarambe yama mu gasho no mu bitaro. Yariba ico abonye cose muhira, akavuga ko yagiye kubiheba amaze kwiba mu muryango nk'ibintu vyoba biciye nk'imodoka.

summaries.title: Afghanistan: uko abigisha babaye mu mirimo yabo
summaries.imageAlt: Afghanistan, ubuzima bwa bamwe mu bigisha

summaries.title: Sudan: uko amasanamu y’ibinyoma ku ntambara akwiragizwa
summaries.imageAlt: Sudan: Itohoza ku masanamu y’ibinyoma mu ntambara

summaries.title: Barcelona: Kizigenza Sergio Busquets agiye gusezera inyuma y’imyaka 18
summaries.description: Kizigenza Sergio Busquets yemeje ko azova muri Barcelona mu mpera z’uno mwaka w’inkino inyuma y’imyaka 18 akinira uno murwi.
summaries.imageAlt: Sergio Busquets yinjiye muri Barcelona mu 2005 akaba yatanguye gukina mu murwi mukuru mu 2008

summaries.title: West Ham 1 - 0 Man U: David de Gea arabaye uruvugo inyuma y’ikosa ryaraye rihumiye umurwi wiwe
summaries.description: Ikosa ryakozwe n’umunyegori David de Gea ryatumye Saïd Benrahma wa West Ham  yinjiza igitsindo kimwe rudende c’urwo rukino ku munota wa 27.
summaries.imageAlt: De Gea

summaries.title: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Neymar, Messi, Fati, Amrabat, Rashford, Kane
summaries.description: Newcastle United irarondera Neymar, nayo Wolves ikaba irondera guha Barcelona imiriyoni 30 z’ama-euro yongere ishireko n’umukinyi wayo wo hagati Ruben Neves, kugira ngo irabe ko aba ba-Catalans boyiha  Ansu Fati w’imyaka 20.
summaries.imageAlt: Neymar

summaries.title: 'Haaland akwiye icyubahiro yahawe' – Guardiola
summaries.description: Umutoza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola avuga ko Erling Haaland yari akwiye icyubahiro yahawe na bagenzi be bamuhagurukira, nyuma yo guca umuhigo wo gutsinda ibitego byinshi muri Premier League mu mwaka w'imikino.
summaries.imageAlt: Haaland yishimira intsinzi

summaries.title: Lionel Messi: Uyu musatirizi wa Argentine azova muri PSG uyu mwaka w'inkino uheze
summaries.description: Lionel Messi azova muri Paris St-Germain mu ci umwaka w’inkino uheze igihe amasezerano yasinye azoba arangiye
summaries.imageAlt: Lionel Messi

summaries.title: Lionel Messi: PSG yamuhagaritse indwi zibiri kubera urugendo yakoze muri Saudi Arabia
summaries.description: Kizigenza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina Lionel Messi yahagaritswe na Paris St-Germain mu kiringo c’indwi zibiri inyuma y’urugendo yagize muri Arabie Saoudite muri ino ndwi ata ruhusha yahawe n’umurwi wiwe.
summaries.imageAlt: Lionel Messi yatsindiye igikombe c'isi yose mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina muri Kigarama (12)

summaries.title: Uko umutoza Florent Ibenge wa Al-Hilal SC yahunze Sudan
summaries.description: Florent Ibenge, umutoza w'Umunye-Congo w'ikipe iri ku mwanya wa mbere muri Sudan, avuga ko yizeye kongera guhura n'abakinnyi be mu gihe cya vuba.
summaries.imageAlt: Umutoza Florent Ibenge wa Al-Hilal mu mukino wa CAF Champions League hagati ya Al Ahly yo mu Misiri na Al-Hilal Omdurman yo muri Sudan

summaries.title: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Haaland, Zaha, Mount, Maddison, Abraham, Dybala, Mané
summaries.description: Manchester City iriko iritegurira ibiganiro na Erling Haaland kugira imuhe amasezerano mashasha, naho Wilfried Zaha  akaba ariko atera amero Arsenal, Juventus, Chelsea na Barcelona, aya n'ayandi ni mu yavugwa kuri uno wa mbere.
summaries.imageAlt: Erling Haaland

summaries.title: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru Pelé yashizwe  muri kazinduzi nk'icitiranwa ca 'mbonekarimwe'
summaries.description: Pelé, iritazirano rya rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru aherutse gupfa, ryabaye icitiranwa ca "kidasanzwe, ntagereranywa, mbonekarimwe".
summaries.imageAlt: Pelé

summaries.title: Igikombe kiri mu biganza byacu kandi tugomba kubibyaza umusaruro – Guardiola
summaries.description: Umutoza Pep Guardiola avuga ko ikipe ye ya Manchester City yerekanye ko ishoboye iyo "nta yandi mahitamo ahari uretse gutsinda", nyuma yuko inyagiye Arsenal bigatuma iba mu mwanya mwiza mu nkundura yo guhatanira igikombe.
summaries.imageAlt: Bumwe mu buryo Pep Guardiola yifashemo mu mukino Man City yatsinzemo Arsenal

summaries.title: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru: Kane, Rashford, Zaha, Neymar, Firmino, Mac Allister, Gavi, Laporte
summaries.description: Manchester United iriko irarondera hasi hejuru umusatirizi wa Tottenham Harry Kane, yongera ikurikiranira hagufi Neymar, nayo Arsenal, Chelsea na Paris St-Germain ikanuriye amaso umusatirizi wa Crystal Palace Wilfried Zaha ...aya n'ayandi ni mu yavugwa kuri uno wa kabiri.
summaries.imageAlt: Neymar

summaries.title: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Messi, Raphinha, Osimhen, Mac Allister, Watkins
summaries.description: Paris St-Germain izorekura Lionel Messi amasezerano ifitaniye nawe arangiye mu ci riza, Barcelona iramaze kuneka abakinyi bashika 13 mu gikorwa co kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’i buryo mu ci riza, aya n'ayandi ni mu yavugwa kuri uno wa Mungu.
summaries.imageAlt: Lionel Messi yakoze ibidasanzwe mu myaka itari mike yamaze akinira umurwi Barcelona wamureze kuva mu bwana, muri kino gihe akaba akinira PSG wo mu Bufaransa

dataSource: Data is from live TIPO page
